channel.title: Electronic Sign on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Electronic Sign on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-5 North - Border Wait Times
item.description: Border Wait Times on I-5 North. Both I-5 (Peace Arch) and WA-543 (Pacific Highway) crossing are less than 5 minutes in this photo. This was taken at 7 AM on a Saturday. As it happened there was only one car in front of me at Canada Customs.

item.title: WA-28 West at WA-285 - East Wenatchee
item.description: WA-28 West at WA-285 in East Wenatchee. Turn left for WA-285 North to Wenatchee. Continue west on WA-28 to US-2 and US-97. The signs directing traffic on WA-28 are an electronic sign.

item.title: I-80 West - Reno Travel Times
item.description: Electronic sign that lists Reno/Sparks area travel times. The sign currently is not displaying times. The sign lists times to US-395, Plumb Lane (via US-395) and Virginia St.
